Strong, Durable, Silent & Long Working Range: The wireless mouse for laptop passes the 10,000,000 times keystroke test to guarantee extra durability, The wireless computer mouse's silent button allows you to work in a quiet environment without worrying about disturbing others; Wireless mouse for laptop with 2.4GHz wireless technology ensures a longer working range reaching up to 10 meters (33ft).     Long Battery Life & Extremely Low Power Consumption: The silent mouse has an 18-month long battery life (battery not included), with an auto power-off function to save power, the silent mouse will enter sleep mode in a few minutes of inactivity. Press any button to wake it up. Note: The wireless mouse for laptop is powered by 1x AA batteries (not included).     Unique TruWave & CoLink Technology: TruWave - provides precise, smart cursor control on many surface types to wireless mouse for laptop; CoLink - once the wireless computer mouse is paired there’s no need to re-establish pairing after a signal loss or shutdown.     Wide Compatibility & Low Power Warning: The wireless mouse for laptop can be well-compatible with Windows 11/10/8/7/XP, Vista 7/8 and Linux, etc. Fits desktops, laptops, PC, Macbooks, and other devices; and the LED battery indicator warns you if the battery is running low.     36 Months Support: If you encounter any problems in using the product, please feel free to contact our professional customer service team, enjoying TECKNET 36 Months Warranty (Registered Only)
